panels.description: Average of CPU usage

targets.expr: avg by (environment, cluster) (1 - avg by (environment, cluster, datacenter, rack, node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack"}[1m])))

panels.title: Avg CPU

panels.description: Average of network throughput (in + out)

targets.expr:
avg by (environment, cluster) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack"}[1m]))
        + avg by (environment, cluster) (irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack"}[1m]))

panels.title: Avg Network Throughput

panels.description: Average of disk throughput (reads + writes)

targets.expr: avg by (environment, cluster) (irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack"}[1m]))

panels.title: Average Disk Throughput

panels.description: Request throughput, "RF * numberOfClientRequests"

targets.expr: sum by (environment, cluster) (irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_threadpools_value{scope="Native-Transport-Requests", name="CompletedTasks", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack",}[1m]))

panels.title: Requests per Second

panels.description: Sum of blocked tasks

targets.expr: sum by (environment, cluster) (irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_threadpools_count{name="TotalBlockedTasks", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack"}[1m]))

panels.title: Blocked Tasks

panels.description: Total Requests Per Cluster, by Request Type

targets.expr: sum by (scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_oneminuterate{scope=~"Read|Write|CASRead|CASWrite|RangeSlice|ViewRead|ViewWrite", name=~"Latency|ViewWriteLatency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Request Throughputs

panels.description: Total Timeouts, Failures, Unavailable Rates for each cluster

targets.expr: sum by (name, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_oneminuterate{scope=~"Read|Write|CASRead|CASWrite|RangeSlice|ViewRead|ViewWrite", name!~"Latency|ViewWriteLatency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Error throughputs

panels.description: Part of reads in the total of standard requests (Reads+Writes). CAS, Views, ... operations are ignored.

targets.expr: sum by (scope, environment, cluster)(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_oneminuterate{scope="Read", name="Latency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}) / ignoring (scope) (sum by (scope, environment, cluster)(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_oneminuterate{scope="Read", name="Latency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}) + ignoring (scope) sum by (scope, environment, cluster)(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_oneminuterate{scope="Write", name="Latency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}))

panels.title: Read / Write Distribution

panels.description: p99 Read latency maximum for coordinated reads

targets.expr: max by (scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_99thpercentile{scope="Read", name="Latency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

min by (scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_99thpercentile{scope="Read", name="Latency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

avg by (scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_99thpercentile{scope="Read", name="Latency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Read Latency (99th percentile)

panels.description: p99 Write latency maximum for coordinated reads

targets.expr: max by (scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_99thpercentile{scope="Write", name="Latency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

min by (scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_99thpercentile{scope="Write", name="Latency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

avg by (scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_99thpercentile{scope="Write", name="Latency", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Write Latency (99th Percentile)

panels.description: Other p99 latencies for coordinated requests

targets.expr: max by (scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_clientrequest_99thpercentile{scope!~"Write|Read|.*-.*", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Other Latencies

panels.description: Disk space used ordered (fullest disks first)

targets.expr:
max by (environment, cluster, datacenter, rack, node, mountpoint)(1-(node_filesystem_avail_bytes{mountpoint!~".*lxcfs.*", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}
        / node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint!~".*lxcfs.*", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}))

panels.title: Disk Space Usage

panels.description: Total sizes of the data on distinct nodes

targets.expr:
sum by (name, environment, cluster)
        (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_value{name=~"LiveDiskSpaceUsed|TotalDiskSpaceUsed", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"} )

panels.title: Total Data Size

panels.description: SSTable Count Max and Average per table

targets.expr: max by (keyspace, scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_value{name="LiveSSTableCount", keyspace=~".+", scope=~".+", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

max by (environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_value{name="LiveSSTableCount", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: SSTable Count

panels.description: Maximum pending compactions on any node in the cluster

targets.expr: max by (environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_value{name="PendingCompactions", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

min by (environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_value{name="PendingCompactions", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

avg by (environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_value{name="PendingCompactions", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Compactions

panels.description: Maximum pending compactions per table

targets.expr: Max by (keyspace, scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_value{name="PendingCompactions", keyspace=~".+", scope=~".+", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Compactions per Table

panels.description: Cluster Wide Pending threads rate, by Thread Pool

targets.expr: sum by (scope, environment) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_threadpools_value{name="PendingTasks", scope!~"RPC-Thread", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Cluster Wide Pending Messages

panels.description: Dropped messages rate summed by message type and cluster

targets.expr: sum by (scope, environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_droppedmessage_oneminuterate{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Dropped Messages

panels.description: Read repair rate summed per cluster

targets.expr: sum by (environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_threadpools_value{name="ActiveTasks", scope="ReadRepairStage", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Read Repairs

panels.description: Sum of hints being handed off per cluster.

targets.expr: sum by (environment, cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_db_storageproxy_hintsinprogress{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Hinted Handoff

panels.description: Maximum CPU utilisation (max 100%)

targets.expr: max by (environment, cluster) (1 - avg by (environment, cluster, datacenter, rack, node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m])))

min by (environment, cluster) (1 - avg by (environment, cluster, datacenter, rack, node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m])))

avg by (environment, cluster) (1 - avg by (environment, cluster, datacenter, rack, node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m])))

panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Max Unix load on a node for a cluster

targets.expr: max by (environment, cluster) (node_load1{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})
min by (environment, cluster) (node_load1{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})
avg by (environment, cluster) (node_load1{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Unix Load (1m rate)

panels.description: Maximum Memory allocated per usage (worst node) - excludes caches, buffers, etc

targets.expr:
min by (environment, cluster)
        (node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: Memory Utilisation

panels.description: Equivalent to r_await and w_await from `iostat -x` - Building help, see: https://www.robustperception.io/mapping-iostat-to-the-node-exporters-node_disk_-metrics

targets.expr:
max by (environment, cluster)
        (100 * irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{device=~".*", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[5m])
        / irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{device=~".*", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[5m]))

max by (environment, cluster)
        (100 * irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{device=~".*", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[5m])
        / irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{device=~".*", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[5m]))

panels.title: Disk IO Wait

panels.description: Network In and Out per cluster

targets.expr: sum by (environment, cluster) (irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m]))
sum by (environment, cluster) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m]))

panels.title: Network I/O

panels.description: Percentage of the time node is doing GC per cluster thus were Cassandra can't use resources

targets.expr: max by (environment, cluster) (sum by (environment, cluster, datacenter, rack, node) (irate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m])))

min by (environment, cluster) (sum by (environment, cluster, datacenter, rack, node) (irate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m])))

avg by (environment, cluster) (sum by (environment, cluster, datacenter, rack, node) (irate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m])))

panels.title: Garbage Collection rate (% time spent doing GC)

panels.description: Max garbage collection duration

targets.expr: max by (gc, environment, cluster) (irate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m]))

panels.title: Garbage Collection Time

panels.description: Garbage Collection Count

targets.expr: max by (gc, environment, cluster) (irate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"}[1m]))

panels.title: Garbage Collection Count

panels.description: Maximum JVM Heap Memory size (worst node)

targets.expr:
max by (environment, cluster)
        (jvm_memory_bytes_used{area="heap", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

min by (environment, cluster)
        (jvm_memory_bytes_max{area="heap", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$datacenter", rack=~"$rack", node=~"$node"})

panels.title: JVM Heap Memory Utilisation
